articles.author: Matthew Keck
articles.title: Indiana Department of Health confirms first measles case in 2025 - WLKY
articles.description: The Indiana Department of Health has confirmed the first case of measles in the state this year.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS —The Indiana Department of Health has confirmed the first case of measles in the state this year.
Officials said the case is in an unvaccinated child in Allen County. This is in the For… [+1029 chars]
